comments: Why! Installed! All in Japanese! Uninstalled before I regretted it!

Unbelievable My hat is off to these developers. You knocked the ball out of the park and deserve some props. Really enjoying my moto 360 thanks to this app. Cutting edge watch faces that are free. Thank you very much! I appreciate your work.
bad app! It cannot sync watchfaces to my watch, l mean this global version
